summary: I HAVE CALLED MY LOCAL HYUNDAI DEALER REGARDING A RECENT RECALL NOTICE I RECEIVED IN THE MAIL. I MADE AN APPOINTMENT TO GET THE REQUIRE REPAIR AND THE DAY BEFORE THE APPOINTMENT, THEY TOLD ME THEY DO NOT HAVE THE NECESSARY PARTS TO COMPLETE THE REPAIR. I AM VERY FRUSTRATED AS THEY HAVE HAD OVER 3 WEEKS TO ORDER THE PARTS AND WAITED TO TELL ME THE DAY BEFORE I AM SCHEDULED TO BRING MY CAR IN. TERRIBLE SERVICE!!
